Ingredients.2: 1 (28 ounce) package frozen potatoes O'Brien with onions and peppers

Ingredients.3: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup

Ingredients.7: 0.25 teaspoon ground black pepper, or more to taste

Directions.1: Pour chicken broth into a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot). Add O'Brien potatoes. Dollop chicken soup over the potatoes. Place cream cheese on top of the chicken soup. Do not stir.

Directions.2: Close and lock the lid. Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 15 minutes. Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.

Directions.3: Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes. Use the quick-release method to release remaining pressure. Add Italian seasoning, garlic salt, and black pepper. Stir to incorporate.
